5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to pray until his feet became swollen. It was said: ‘O Messenger of Allah, Allah has forgiven you your past and future sins.’ He said: ‘Should I not be a thankful slave?’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي طُولِ الْقِيَامِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning standing for a long time in Prayer
